member.summary: Palco Cache API - Simple key-value storage for Anfiteatro.

member.summary: Check if registration is enabled (public endpoint).

member.summary: Submit a registration request (public endpoint). Only allows writing to 'request-*' keys in the registration namespace.

member.summary: Get a cached value by key.

member.summary: Set a cached value.

member.summary: Delete a cached value.

member.summary: Get multiple cached values.

member.summary: Delete all entries in a namespace.

member.summary: Clean expired cache entries.

member.summary: Get cache statistics.

member.summary: JSON value to cache (stored as-is).

member.summary: Time to live in seconds. 0 = never expire.

member.summary: Request ID (must start with 'request-').

member.summary: JSON data for the registration request.

member.name: P:Palco.Api.RegistrationRequestPayload.TtlSeconds
member.summary: Time to live in seconds.

member.name: T:Palco.Plugin
member.summary: Palco - A minimal caching plugin for Anfiteatro. Provides simple key-value storage for client-side caching needs.

member.name: T:Palco.PluginConfiguration
member.summary: Plugin configuration (minimal - just for future extensibility).

member.name: P:Palco.PluginConfiguration.DefaultExpiryHours
member.summary: Default cache expiry in hours. 0 = never expire.

member.name: P:Palco.PluginConfiguration.MaxCacheSizeMB
member.summary: Maximum cache size in MB. 0 = unlimited.

member.summary: Registers Palco services with the DI container.
